Key Match Events: Pakistan won by 7 wickets against Bangladesh
Fakhar Zaman was the top scorer for Pakistan with 81 runs and was adjudged the Player of the Match
Miscellaneous Highlights: Pakistan's third win keeps their semi-final hopes alive
Others: Bangladesh were bowled out for 204 in 45 overs
Mahmadullah was the top scorer for Bangladesh with 56 runs
Mohammad Wasim Jr. and Shaheen Afridi picked up three wickets each for Pakistan
Pakistan chased down the target in just 32 overs, losing three wickets along the way
